title: Effectiveness of the small private online course‐based flipped teaching program for enhancing nursing students’ self-directed learning ability in the Surgical Nursing course: A practical study
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Juling Xu, Sanxiong Huang, Chengliang Wu, Yujie Ren, Qiannan Li, Jiali Cai, Chunsheng Wang, Peiyu Jiang
